summary: Provides a foundational implementation for encoder-decoder recurrent neural network transducer (RNNT) models that operate on byte-pair-encoding (BPE) subword units, handling model configuration, data loading, decoding strategy selection, vocabulary updates, and model discovery.
business_intent: Enable rapid development and deployment of speech-to-text solutions that require efficient subword tokenization and flexible decoding, supporting customizable data pipelines and model management for commercial ASR products.
